label: A3B_oP16_62_3c_c-003
title: NiBi$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Some authorities designate RhBi$_{3}$ as the prototype for this structure. 
 NiBi$_{3}$ has the same AFLOW label, A3B\_oP16\_62\_3c\_c, as \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_oP16_62_3c_c-002}{$D0_{16}$ NH$_{4}$I$_{3}$}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
